Luchini, Tiago

I build digital products people use everyday. Avid distance runner, Open Source supporter, software engineer at heart, business by training, and board game enthusiast. Partner, Technology @ work.co.

Active Open Source Projects

  • Peon Idiomatic dispatch of Om Next transactions from stateless components.
  • ContentQL Access Contentful data using Om Next Queries.
  • terra Write Terraform configurations in pure Clojure.
  • lein-terra Companion Leiningen plugin to terra.
  • Concordia Converters for Om Next Queries to GraphQL and vice-versa.

Active Open Source Forks

  • garden-watcher A component that watches-and-recompiles your Garden stylesheets.

Tools, Toys & Other Shareables

  • beautiful-md Docker image to encapsulate all you need to create beautiful (a la LaTeX) PDF files from your markdown files.
  • LazyPP The PowerPoint/Keynote of the Lazy Pragmatic Presenter.
  • emacs.d My very own emacs config.

Older Stuff

  • snapshoter Distributed implementation of a configurable headless renderer complaint with the escaped fragment specification.
